attributes.action: The UK government needs to stop people coming from third world countries.
attributes.additional_details: Among areas which are subject to mass immigration from countries like Pakistan and African nations crime rates go up and also the areas are always very poor, with very high numbers of tower block flats and of course, poverty. In many instances it is that the white British population have had to move out of these poverty stricken areas of London in to other parts the city to seek a better standard of life. Areas of high immigration have the highest birthrates in the country yet are the poorest.
attributes.background: Mass immigration from third world countries is ruining our culture and most importantly British values,turning our first world nation into a nation like the countries they're coming from.These people coming from poverty filled countries are usually seeking benefits which is costing us economically
